title: P06-2012

sentences.text: This paper presents an unsupervised learning approach to disambiguate various relations between named entities by use of various lexical and syntactic features from the contexts .

It works by calculating eigenvectors of an adjacency graph 's Laplacian to recover a submanifold of data from a high dimensionality space and then performing cluster number estimation on the eigenvectors .
Experiment results on ACE corpora show that this spectral clustering based approach outperforms the other clustering methods .

kg2text: This spectral clustering based approach uses an unsupervised learning method that calculates eigenvectors of an adjacency graph's Laplacian. This paper presents this approach, which outperforms other clustering methods and has been shown to be effective in disambiguating various relations between named entities through experiment. The process involves calculating eigenvectors and then performing cluster number estimation on them. It works by calculating the eigenvalues of an adjacency graph's Laplacian, allowing for unsupervised learning approach that can disambiguate various relations between named entities.
